name: Gib Guilbeau
description: '''Floyd August''' "'''Gib'''" '''Guilbeau''' (September 26, 1937 â€“ April 12, 2016) was an American [[Cajun]] [[country rock]] musician and songwriter. As a member of [[Nashville West]], [[Swampwater]], The [[Flying Burrito Brothers]], and later The [[Burrito Brothers]], Guilbeau helped pioneer the fusion of rock and country music in the 1960s.
